loginUrl.title: Login URL
loginUrl.description: LanguageTool Enterprise supports OpenID/ADFS/oAuth-managed logins. Usually requires apiServerUrl to be also set. Defaults to LanguageTool's own login server. Contact support@languagetoolplus.com for more information.

apiServerUrl.title: Custom Server URL
apiServerUrl.description: Check texts against your own LanguageTool server. Defaults to LanguageTool's own login server. Contact support@languagetoolplus.com for more information.

disablePrivacyConfirmation.title: Hide privacy confirmation dialog
disablePrivacyConfirmation.description: Set this to 'true' if your users should not see the privacy confirmation dialog during installation. Defaults to 'false'.

disablePersonalDictionary.title: Disable Personal Dictionary
disablePersonalDictionary.description: Set this to 'true' if you do not want your users to be able to add words to their dictionary. Defaults to 'false'.

disableIgnoredRules.title: Disable Ignored Rules
disableIgnoredRules.description: Set this to 'true' if you do not want your users to be able to ignore grammar rules. Defaults to 'false'.
